parameter.name: LocalSqlServer-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: LocalSqlServer Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.

parameter.name: MCUContext-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: MCUContext Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=localhost\SQLEXPRESS;Initial Catalog=MCU;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=MCU;Password=123123
